item.title: Development
item.description: Table of Contents The Story Getting started & Finding a workflow The development itself Template Innovations Gantry Kinematics Extrusion setup Z-axis Frame & Base Electronics & Firmware PET Recycling unit Final takeaways, next steps Note: Currrently, Alex is the only developer of the project, so this was written entirely by them, from their perspective.
